M

main(String[]) - Static method in class controller.Starter
 
mainFrame - Class in Vue
The class mainFrame is a class who create the main window of the game.It implements the interface Observer in order to update its contents once the game has changed.
mainFrame(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Vue.mainFrame
The constructor for mainFrame.It will create a window and make itself a observer of the game.Meanwhile, it will create an instance of endDialog in order to check whether the game is over.
mainFrameOrig - Class in Vue
 
mainFrameOrig(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Vue.mainFrameOrig
 
Majority(CarteValeur) - Method in class moteur.Trophie
The FIRST type of the trophy.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in class moteur.strategy.faceUpTheBigger
Aims to choose one card face up, this methode will choose the bigger card in order to minimize the lose and try to maximize the gain.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in class moteur.strategy.faceUpTheFirst
Aims to choose one card face up, this methode will choose the first card.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in class moteur.strategy.randomTake
This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in interface moteur.strategy.Strategy
Ask the player to make an offer.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in class moteur.strategy.takeTheBest
This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
makeOffer(Player) - Method in class moteur.strategy.takeTheBestEnfer
This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
makeOfferToOthers(int) - Method in class moteur.Player
A Player can make offer to others, when other player chooses this one, this methode will be called, with the parameter index, this Player will return the card, by using the methode getOfferByIndex(index).
moteur - package moteur
The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor.
moteur.strategy - package moteur.strategy
Given the fact that a PlayerVirtuel should make the disicion like a humain do, at the meantime they should act differently according to the level of difficulity chosen before a game start, we use the Design Pattern Stragety to realize that.
